Set.Text: The Nuclear Plant gives a large boost to the Cities [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production as well as providing bonus [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for each source of [ICON_RES_URANIUM] Uranium worked by this City. The Nuclear Plant requires Uranium to be built and cannot be built in a City that already has a Solar Plant. A Factory is a prerequisite for this Building.
Each source of [ICON_RES_URANIUM] Uranium worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.
